# EDUCATION

* M.A. Geography coursework, 4.0 GPA  
* Completed 18 units; transferred Fall 2009

### Rowan University, New Jersey
* M.A., College Student Personnel Services, 1998  
* B.A., Art Education (Major) and Graphic Design (Minor), 1995
